meanings: (알맞다) right, proper, suitable (for), fit (for), appropriate (for/to), adequate (for); (지나치지 않다) moderate (=적절하다)

vlive.korean: 저는 그... 적당한 어떠한 그... For me... This kind of... 듣기 View video Park Bo Young : 워...ㄹ요일
적당한 거리는 유지를 해줘야지~ - 세월아 네월아 해야 된다며~ You need to maintain a right distance. - You said that I need to take my time. 듣기 View video IU : [IU TV] 아이유 분노의 시승식!
vlive.english: You need to maintain a right distance. - You said that I need to take my time.

vlive.korean: 그냥 적당한... A reasonable size... 듣기 View video TWICE : 모쯔♡
[이 적당한 거리가 얼마나 중요하냐?] 얼마나 중요하냐? is this moderate distance? 듣기 View video AB6IX : [예삐소드] AB6IX (에이비식스) 2019 AWARDS BEHIND #1
적당한 예가 없는데... There's no good example. 듣기 View video PENTAGON : 펜타곤 - 펜토리 #71 ('2018 KPMA' 비하인드)

examples.korean: The company’s commitment to providing quality at a reasonable price has been vital to its success. 발음듣기 적당한 가격에 양질을 제공하겠다는 그 회사의 약속이 회사 성공에 절대적이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The company’s commitment to providing quality at a reasonable price has been vital to its success. 발음

examples.korean: Politicians are legitimate targets for satire. 발음듣기 정치인들은 풍자의 적당한 대상이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Politicians are legitimate targets for satire. 발음

examples.korean: He found a suitable place, scraped a hole and buried the bag in it. 발음듣기 그가 적당한 장소를 찾고는 구멍을 하나 파서 그 안에 그 가방을 묻었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He found a suitable place, scraped a hole and buried the bag in it. 발음

examples.korean: We wish you success in finding the right place. 발음듣기 적당한 회사를 찾는 데 성공하시기를 기원합니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: We wish you success in finding the right place. 발음

examples.korean: I make an effort to get out of the office at a reasonable hour twice a week. 발음듣기 일주일에 두 번은 적당한 시간에 귀가하려고 노력합니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: I make an effort to get out of the office at a reasonable hour twice a week. 발음
